title: SonicX
description: Developed an innovative music recommendation system using machine learning. Implemented collaborative filtering algorithms to analyze user preferences and provide personalized music suggestions. The project utilized Python for ML, creating a seamless user experience for discovering new tunes.

title: SMART PARKING SYSTEM using IOT
description: Developed a dashboard which provides real-time monitoring of parking spaces providing a more efficient parking experience for drivers. Users can easily check the availability of parking spaces through dashboard which saves time spent on searching for a parking spot.

title: FOOD WASTE MANAGEMENT SYSTEM WEBSITE
description: Developed a website which will help restaurants to reduce food waste. The restaurant member will request NGO member to collect the leftover food and once the request is accepted the NGOâ€™s will collect the food for its distribution.
